metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3387 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Moodle 2.3.x before 2.3.1 uses only a client-side check for whether references are permitted in a file upload, which allows remote authenticated users to bypass intended alias (aka shortcut) restrictions via a client that omits this check.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3387` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
